ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Hot Springs Vector Magnetic Field Data
ResourceHeader.Description: Ground-based vector magnetic field at Hot Springs, Montana, 0.5 s, THEMIS GEONS Network, Lower latitude chain (Lat 47.6, Long 245.3). Station Code: HOTS.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically: S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the data

InformationURL.Name: Geomagnetic Event Observation Network by Students (GEONS) Magnetic Field Data Portal
THEMIS Ground-based Observatory (GBO) Network Information Web Site
Magnetic Field Calibration File Web Site

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb FTP Access
AccessURL.Description: NASA/GSFC CDAWeb ftp access to the data.

AccessURL.Name: ASCII, CDF, and plots from CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically: S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the data

NumericalData.Keyword: CDF Global Attribute MISSION_GROUP: THEMIS CDF Global Attribute MISSION_GROUP: Ground-Based Investigations
CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Ionospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DATA_TYPE: MAG>Magnetic Field
CDF Global Attribute MODS: Revision Aug 16 2006
CDF Global Attribute GENERATED_BY: THEMIS SOC
CDF Global Attribute RULES_OF_USE: Open Data for Scientific Use.

Parameter.Name: B in HDZ Components
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_hots_epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

Parameter.Name: H component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_hots_epoch
Parameter.Description: H component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_hots.

Parameter.Name: D component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_hots_epoch
Parameter.Description: D component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_hots.

Parameter.Name: Z component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_hots_epoch
Parameter.Description: Z component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_hots.

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_hots_epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: thg_mag_hots_epoch0, thg_mag_hots_time.
